para.programlisting:
#include <opensc.h>
int sc_delete_file(struct sc_card *card, const struct sc_path *path);

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function deletes a file specified by path on card.

refsect1.title: Return value
refsect1.para: Returns 0 if successful, or a negative value in case of error.
